I’m very happy that Jessica Lynch is safe. I’m also impressed at the rescue operation which succeeded where others had failed (resulting in nine marine deaths). Apr 3, 2003

Sadaam: Responsible, Clever, or Insignificant?

Either: (1) Sadaam is showing an “astonishing degree of responsibility and restraint in the teeth of extreme provocation” by not using his weapons. (2) The US is heading into a trap. Or, (3) there are no WMDs to begin with.

War silencing debate on budget cuts

The war in Iraq might not be going quite as smoothly as the Bush administration hoped, but the war at home is going just swimmingly. War is silencing debate not just on the wisdom of Bush’s foreign policy but on a host of other issues that would normally be front-page news.
